summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection. A white sedan is ahead in the left lane, and a scooter with two individuals is on the right side. The scooter suddenly moves into the intersection, causing the individuals to fall off and land directly in front of the vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is decelerating as it approaches the intersection. The sudden appearance of the scooter and the fall of the individuals necessitate rapid deceleration to avoid collision.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A scooter with two individuals, approximately 5 meters away, suddenly moves into the intersection and falls, causing immediate danger. 2) Front: A white sedan, approximately 20 meters away, maintaining its lane and speed.
